gw.api.database

Class QueryOptimizer

  • gw.api.database.QueryOptimizer

  • public class QueryOptimizer
    Allows a DB optimization to be performed on the query before it is sent.

    There are two methods that can be used for optimization, before query and after query. These methods can access the DB to turn on options.

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void executeAfterQuery(com.guidewire.pl.system.database.Database database, com.guidewire.pl.system.database.Query<T> query)
      Executes just after the query is executed
      void executeBeforeQuery(com.guidewire.pl.system.database.Database database, com.guidewire.pl.system.database.Query<T> query)
      Executes just before the query is executed
      boolean shouldExecute()
      Hook for each implementation to have a chance to decide whether to execute. Typically, each QueryOptimizer would check whether it is applicable for the current database.

      • shouldExecute

        boolean shouldExecute()
        Hook for each implementation to have a chance to decide whether to execute. Typically, each QueryOptimizer would check whether it is applicable for the current database.
        Returns:
        true if this optimizer should execute
